title: What is the significance of the Financial Revolution? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: What is the significance of the Financial Revolution? What Financial Revolution? Do you mean the ensuing collapse of those nations that have embraced quantitative easing, where their central banks (eg: the USA Federal Reserve) create money out of thin air, which the national government borrows, and has to repay plus interest, so it can prop up a failing economy? It so, the significance is that such is unsustainable! No economy can survive by accumulating debt, especially when national revenues are in decline as they are in the USA!
